example: Newman added that such things as holy water, sacerdotal vestments, and images were “all of pagan origin, and sanctified by their adoption into the Church.”
example_meaning: Ông Newman nói thêm rằng những thứ như nước thánh, y phục nhà tu và các hình tượng, “tất cả đều bắt nguồn từ tà giáo, và trở nên thánh sạch sau khi được Giáo hội chấp nhận”.

example: South transept .
example_meaning: Hành lang phía Nam.
definition: (architecture) The transversal part of a church, which crosses at right angles to the greatest length, and between the nave and choir. In the basilicas, this had often no projection at its two ends. In Gothic churches these project greatly, and should be called the arms of the transept. It is common, however, to speak of the arms themselves as the transepts.
